text: Stefan Lambov Danailov () (9 December 1942 - 27 November 2019) was a Bulgarian actor. He was Minister of Culture of Bulgaria from August 2005 to July 2009. An actor, his best known roles were in Ladies' Choice, Affection and in Something Out of Nothing. Danailov died on 27 November 2019 in Sofia of lymphoma, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:Bulgarian movie actors Category:Politicians from Sofia Category:Actors from Sofia
title: Stefan Danailov
